metadata.description: The friendly name for the workbook that is used in the Gallery or Saved List.  This name must be unique within a resource group.
The gallery that the workbook will been shown under. Supported values include workbook, tsg, etc. Usually, this is 'workbook'
The friendly name for the workspace that is used in the Gallery or Saved List.  This name must be unique within a resource group.
The friendly name for the connected cluster.  This name must be unique within a resource group.
The id of resource instance to which the workbook will be associated
The unique guid for this workbook instance
The id of resource instance to which the workbook will be associated
The Azure region with which the workbook will be associated

content.json:
# CoreDNS workbook
---

With prometheus exported metrics from CoreDNS is useful to understand more about the servers, panics,duration to process, soze of request/response. The default location for the metrics is localhost:9153. The metrics path is fixed to /metrics.

parameters.name: Resource
parameters.label: Workspace
parameters.query:
InsightsMetrics 
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name has "coredns_"
| distinct _ResourceId

parameters.name: Computer
parameters.label: Hostname
parameters.query:
InsightsMetrics 
| where Namespace == "prometheus"and Name contains "coredns_"
| extend Json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend hostname = tostring(Json.hostName)
| distinct hostname

content.query:
InsightsMetrics 
| where Namespace == "prometheus"and Name contains "coredns_"
| summarize by Name
| extend Category=case( Name contains "_dns", "DNS",  
                        Name contains "health", "Health",
                        Name contains "cache", "Cache",
                        Name contains "response", "Process",
                        Name contains "request", "Process",
                        "Others")
| project Category, Name
| order by Category asc
content.title: Metrics Collected

content.query:
InsightsMetrics 
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name contains "coredns_build_info"
| extend Json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend
    HostName = tostring(Json.hostName),
    Version = tostring(Json.version)
| distinct Version
content.title: Version

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name contains 'coredns_forward_healthcheck_broken_total'
| extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)
| extend HostName = tostring(Tags.hostName), PodName = Tags.pod_name
| extend NodeDisk = strcat(PodName, "/", HostName)
| order by NodeDisk asc, TimeGenerated asc
| serialize
| extend PrevVal = iif(prev(NodeDisk) != NodeDisk, 0.0, prev(Val)), PrevTimeGenerated = iif(prev(NodeDisk) != NodeDisk, datetime(null), prev(TimeGenerated))
| where isnotnull(PrevTimeGenerated) //and PrevTimeGenerated != TimeGenerated
| extend Rate = iif(PrevVal > Val, Val / (datetime_diff('Second', TimeGenerated, PrevTimeGenerated) * 1), iif(PrevVal == Val, 0.0, (Val - PrevVal) / (datetime_diff('Second', TimeGenerated, PrevTimeGenerated) * 1)))
//| where isnotnull(Rate)
| project TimeGenerated, NodeDisk, Rate, HostName
| summarize Failed_Reloads = sum(Rate) by HostName
content.title: Upstream Health Check Fails

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name contains 'coredns_forward_max_concurrent_rejects_total'
| extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)
| extend HostName = tostring(Tags.hostName), PodName = Tags.pod_name
| extend NodeDisk = strcat(PodName, "/", HostName)
| order by NodeDisk asc, TimeGenerated asc
| serialize
| extend PrevVal = iif(prev(NodeDisk) != NodeDisk, 0.0, prev(Val)), PrevTimeGenerated = iif(prev(NodeDisk) != NodeDisk, datetime(null), prev(TimeGenerated))
| where isnotnull(PrevTimeGenerated) //and PrevTimeGenerated != TimeGenerated
| extend Rate = iif(PrevVal > Val, Val / (datetime_diff('Second', TimeGenerated, PrevTimeGenerated) * 1), iif(PrevVal == Val, 0.0, (Val - PrevVal) / (datetime_diff('Second', TimeGenerated, PrevTimeGenerated) * 1)))
//| where isnotnull(Rate)
| project TimeGenerated, NodeDisk, Rate, HostName
| summarize Failed_Reloads = sum(Rate) by HostName
content.title: Upstream Rejected Queries

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name contains 'coredns_panics_total'
| extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)
| extend HostName = tostring(Tags.hostName), PodName = Tags.pod_name
| extend NodeDisk = strcat(PodName, "/", HostName)
| order by NodeDisk asc, TimeGenerated asc
| serialize
| extend PrevVal = iif(prev(NodeDisk) != NodeDisk, 0.0, prev(Val)), PrevTimeGenerated = iif(prev(NodeDisk) != NodeDisk, datetime(null), prev(TimeGenerated))
| where isnotnull(PrevTimeGenerated) //and PrevTimeGenerated != TimeGenerated
| extend Rate = iif(PrevVal > Val, Val / (datetime_diff('Second', TimeGenerated, PrevTimeGenerated) * 1), iif(PrevVal == Val, 0.0, (Val - PrevVal) / (datetime_diff('Second', TimeGenerated, PrevTimeGenerated) * 1)))
//| where isnotnull(Rate)
| project TimeGenerated, NodeDisk, Rate, HostName
| summarize Failed_Reloads = sum(Rate) by HostName
content.title: Panics

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name contains 'coredns_reload_failed_total'
| extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)
| extend HostName = tostring(Tags.hostName), PodName = Tags.pod_name
| extend NodeDisk = strcat(PodName, "/", HostName)
| order by NodeDisk asc, TimeGenerated asc
| serialize
| extend PrevVal = iif(prev(NodeDisk) != NodeDisk, 0.0, prev(Val)), PrevTimeGenerated = iif(prev(NodeDisk) != NodeDisk, datetime(null), prev(TimeGenerated))
| where isnotnull(PrevTimeGenerated) //and PrevTimeGenerated != TimeGenerated
| extend Rate = iif(PrevVal > Val, Val / (datetime_diff('Second', TimeGenerated, PrevTimeGenerated) * 1), iif(PrevVal == Val, 0.0, (Val - PrevVal) / (datetime_diff('Second', TimeGenerated, PrevTimeGenerated) * 1)))
//| where isnotnull(Rate)
| project TimeGenerated, NodeDisk, Rate, HostName
| summarize Failed_Reloads = sum(Rate) by HostName
content.title: Failed Reloads

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name contains 'node_cpu_seconds_total'
| extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)
| extend HostName = tostring(Tags.hostName), Cpu = Tags.cpu, Mode = Tags.mode
| where Mode == "idle"
| extend NodeDisk = strcat(Mode, "/", Cpu, "/", HostName)
| order by NodeDisk asc, TimeGenerated asc
| serialize
| extend PrevVal = iif(prev(NodeDisk) != NodeDisk, 0.0, prev(Val)), PrevTimeGenerated = iif(prev(NodeDisk) != NodeDisk, datetime(null), prev(TimeGenerated))
| where isnotnull(PrevTimeGenerated) //and PrevTimeGenerated != TimeGenerated
| extend Rate = iif(PrevVal > Val, Val / (datetime_diff('Second', TimeGenerated, PrevTimeGenerated) * 1), iif(PrevVal == Val, 0.0, (Val - PrevVal) / (datetime_diff('Second', TimeGenerated, PrevTimeGenerated) * 1)))
//| where isnotnull(Rate)
| project TimeGenerated, NodeDisk, Rate, HostName
| summarize CpuUsage = 100 - (100 * avg(Rate)) by HostName
content.title: CPU TIme

content.query:
InsightsMetrics 
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name contains "coredns_dns_requests_total"
| extend Json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend
    HostName = tostring(Json.hostName),
    PodName = tostring(Json.pod_name),
    PodNamespace = tostring(Json.namespace),
    Server = tostring(Json.server),
    Zone = tostring(Json.zone),
    Protocol = tostring(Json.proto),
    Family = tostring(Json.family),
    Type = tostring(Json.type)
| extend NodeDisk = strcat(HostName, "/", PodName, "/", PodNamespace, "/", Server, "/", Zone, "/", Protocol, "/", Family, "/", Type)
| order by NodeDisk asc, TimeGenerated asc
| serialize
| extend
    PrevVal = iif(prev(NodeDisk) != NodeDisk, 0.0, prev(Val)),
    PrevTimeGenerated = iif(prev(NodeDisk) != NodeDisk, datetime(null), prev(TimeGenerated))
| where isnotnull(PrevTimeGenerated) //and PrevTimeGenerated != TimeGenerated
| extend
    valdiff = iif(PrevVal > Val, Val, iif(PrevVal == Val, 0.0, (Val - PrevVal))),
    timediff= (datetime_diff('Second', TimeGenerated, PrevTimeGenerated) * 1)
| summarize Requests = sum(valdiff) / sum(timediff) by HostName, PodName, PodNamespace, Server, Zone, Protocol, Family, Type
//| extend Rate = iif(PrevVal > Val, Val / (datetime_diff('Second', TimeGenerated, PrevTimeGenerated) * 1), iif(PrevVal == Val, 0.0, (Val - PrevVal) / (datetime_diff('Second', TimeGenerated, PrevTimeGenerated) * 1)))
//| summarize Requests = avg(Rate) by NodeDisk
content.title: Total Requests

content.query:
InsightsMetrics 
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name contains "coredns_dns_requests_total"
| extend Json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend
    HostName = tostring(Json.hostName),
    PodName = tostring(Json.pod_name),
    PodNamespace = tostring(Json.namespace),
    Server = tostring(Json.server),
    Zone = tostring(Json.zone),
    Protocol = tostring(Json.proto),
    Family = tostring(Json.family),
    Type = tostring(Json.type)
| extend NodeDisk = strcat(HostName, "/", PodName, "/", PodNamespace, "/", Server, "/", Zone, "/", Protocol, "/", Family, "/", Type)
| order by NodeDisk asc, TimeGenerated asc
| serialize
| extend
    PrevVal = iif(prev(NodeDisk) != NodeDisk, 0.0, prev(Val)),
    PrevTimeGenerated = iif(prev(NodeDisk) != NodeDisk, datetime(null), prev(TimeGenerated))
| where isnotnull(PrevTimeGenerated) //and PrevTimeGenerated != TimeGenerated
| extend valdiff = iif(PrevVal > Val, Val, iif(PrevVal == Val, 0.0, (Val - PrevVal))), timediff= (datetime_diff('Second', TimeGenerated, PrevTimeGenerated) * 1)
| summarize Requests = sum(valdiff)/sum(timediff) by bin(TimeGenerated,30m), HostName
//| extend Rate = iif(PrevVal > Val, Val / (datetime_diff('Second', TimeGenerated, PrevTimeGenerated) * 1), iif(PrevVal == Val, 0.0, (Val - PrevVal) / (datetime_diff('Second', TimeGenerated, PrevTimeGenerated) * 1)))
//| summarize Requests = avg(Rate) by NodeDisk
content.title: Total Requests over Time per Host

    HostName = tostring(Json.hostName),

    Server = tostring(Json.server),
    Zone = tostring(Json.zone),
    Protocol = tostring(Json.proto),
    Family = tostring(Json.family),
    Type = tostring(Json.type)
| extend NodeDisk = strcat(HostName, "/", PodName, "/", PodNamespace, "/", Server, "/", Zone, "/", Protocol, "/", Family, "/", Type)
| order by NodeDisk asc, TimeGenerated asc
| serialize
| extend
    PrevVal = iif(prev(NodeDisk) != NodeDisk, 0.0, prev(Val)),
    PrevTimeGenerated = iif(prev(NodeDisk) != NodeDisk, datetime(null), prev(TimeGenerated))

| extend

content.query:
InsightsMetrics 
//| where _ResourceId == ({Resource})
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name contains "coredns_dns_responses_total"
| extend Json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend
    HostName = tostring(Json.hostName),
    PodNamespace = tostring(Json.namespace),
    PodName = tostring(Json.pod_name),
    Server = tostring(Json.server),
    Zone = tostring(Json.zone),
    RCode = tostring(Json.rcode),
    Plugin = tostring(Json.plugin)
| extend NodeDisk = strcat(HostName, "/", PodName, "/", PodNamespace, "/", Server, "/", Zone,"/", RCode,"/", Plugin)
| order by NodeDisk asc, TimeGenerated asc
| serialize
| extend
    PrevVal = iif(prev(NodeDisk) != NodeDisk, 0.0, prev(Val)),
   PrevTimeGenerated = iif(prev(NodeDisk) != NodeDisk, datetime(null), prev(TimeGenerated))
| where isnotnull(PrevTimeGenerated) //and PrevTimeGenerated != TimeGenerated
| extend diffVal = iif(PrevVal > Val, Val, iif(PrevVal == Val, 0.0, (Val - PrevVal))), datediff = datetime_diff('Second', TimeGenerated, PrevTimeGenerated)
| project TimeGenerated, NodeDisk, diffVal, HostName, Type,  PodName, PodNamespace, datediff
| summarize Response = sum(diffVal)
content.title: Total Responses

| extend
    PrevVal = iif(prev(NodeDisk) != NodeDisk, 0.0, prev(Val)),
   PrevTimeGenerated = iif(prev(NodeDisk) != NodeDisk, datetime(null), prev(TimeGenerated))
| where isnotnull(PrevTimeGenerated) //and PrevTimeGenerated != TimeGenerated
| extend diffVal = iif(PrevVal > Val, Val, iif(PrevVal == Val, 0.0, (Val - PrevVal))), datediff = datetime_diff('Second', TimeGenerated, PrevTimeGenerated)
| project TimeGenerated, NodeDisk, diffVal, HostName, Server,  PodName, PodNamespace, datediff, Zone, RCode, Plugin
| summarize Response = sum(diffVal) by bin(TimeGenerated,30m)
content.title: Response count over time

content.query:
InsightsMetrics 
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name contains "coredns_dns_responses_total"
| extend Json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend
    HostName = tostring(Json.hostName),
    PodNamespace = tostring(Json.namespace),
    PodName = tostring(Json.pod_name),
    Server = tostring(Json.server),
    Zone = tostring(Json.zone),
    RCode = tostring(Json.rcode),
    Plugin = tostring(Json.plugin)
| extend NodeDisk = strcat(HostName, "/", PodName, "/", PodNamespace, "/", Server, "/", Zone,"/", RCode,"/", Plugin)
| order by NodeDisk asc, TimeGenerated asc
| serialize
| extend
    PrevVal = iif(prev(NodeDisk) != NodeDisk, 0.0, prev(Val)),
   PrevTimeGenerated = iif(prev(NodeDisk) != NodeDisk, datetime(null), prev(TimeGenerated))
| where isnotnull(PrevTimeGenerated) //and PrevTimeGenerated != TimeGenerated
| extend diffVal = iif(PrevVal > Val, Val, iif(PrevVal == Val, 0.0, (Val - PrevVal))), datediff = datetime_diff('Second', TimeGenerated, PrevTimeGenerated)
| project TimeGenerated, NodeDisk, diffVal, HostName, Server,  PodName, PodNamespace, datediff, Zone, RCode, Plugin
| summarize Response = sum(diffVal) by bin(TimeGenerated,30m), tostring(RCode)
content.title: Response over time per RCode

    HostName = tostring(Json.hostName),

    PrevVal = iif(prev(NodeDisk) != NodeDisk, 0.0, prev(Val)),

content.query:
KubePodInventory
| where Name has strcat("{Application}","-")
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| distinct Computer, Name, Namespace
| summarize dcount(Name) by Computer
content.title: Count of Pod running in each Node

content.query:
KubePodInventory
| where Name has strcat("{Application}","-")
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| distinct Computer, Name, Namespace, ContainerID
| summarize dcount(ContainerID) by Computer
content.title: Count of Container running in each Node

content.query:
KubePodInventory
| where Name has strcat("{Application}","-")
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| distinct Computer, Namespace, Name, _ResourceId, PodStatus
| summarize count() by PodStatus
content.title: Pod Status

content.query:
KubePodInventory
| where Name has strcat("{Application}","-")
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| distinct Computer, Namespace, Name, _ResourceId, PodStatus

content.query:
KubePodInventory
| where Name has strcat("{Application}","-")
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, Namespace, Name, PodUid, PodCreationTimeStamp, PodRestartCount, PodStartTime, PodStatus, PodIp, ServiceName, ControllerKind, ControllerName
| summarize sum(PodRestartCount) by bin(TimeGenerated,30m), Name

KubePodInventory

content.query:
KubePodInventory
| where Name has strcat("{Application}","-")
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, Namespace, Name, ContainerID, ContainerLastStatus, ContainerName, ContainerRestartCount, ContainerStartTime, ContainerStatus, ContainerStatusReason, ControllerKind, ControllerName
| summarize sum(ContainerRestartCount) by bin(TimeGenerated,30m), ContainerName
content.title: Container details

content.json: ##  _Click on a Pod to see more details about the Container's listed, logs, events and more information._

content.query:
KubePodInventory
| where Name has strcat("{Application}","-")
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| distinct Computer, Name, Namespace, ContainerName
| extend PodName = Name
| project-away Name
| project-reorder Computer, PodName, Namespace, ContainerName
content.title: List Node, Pod, Containers

content.query:
let row = dynamic({row});
KubePodInventory
| where Name has strcat("{Application}", "-")
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where '{row}' == '{}' or (Name == row.PodName)
//| where TimeGenerated >= ago(startDateTime)
| where Namespace in('default', 'kube-system', 'nc-system') // and ControllerKind == 'ReplicaSet' // the system namespace filter goes here
| distinct
    ClusterName,
    Computer,
    PodUid,
    TimeGenerated,
    PodStatus,
    ServiceName,
    PodLabel,
    Namespace,
    ContainerStatus,
    Name,
    ControllerKind
| summarize
    arg_max(TimeGenerated, *),
    TotalPODCount = count(),
    podCount = sumif(1, PodStatus == 'Running' or PodStatus != 'Running'),
    containerNotrunning = sumif(1, ContainerStatus != 'running')
    by
    ClusterName,
    TimeGenerated,
    ServiceName,
    PodLabel,
    Namespace,
    Name,
    ControllerKind
| project
    ClusterName,
    ServiceName,
    podCount,
    containerNotrunning,
    containerNotrunningPercent = (containerNotrunning * 100 / podCount),
    TimeGenerated,
    PodStatus,
    PodLabel,
    Namespace,
    Environment = tostring(split(ClusterName, '-')[3]),
    Location = tostring(split(ClusterName, '-')[4]),
    ContainerStatus,
    ControllerKind,
    Name,
    Computer
//Uncomment the below line to set for automated alert
| where PodStatus == "Running" //and containerNotrunningPercent > _minalertThreshold and containerNotrunningPercent < _maxalertThreshold
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *), c_entry=count() by PodLabel, ServiceName, ClusterName, ControllerKind, Name, Computer
//Below lines are to parse the labels to identify the impacted service/component name
| extend parseLabel = replace(@'k8s-app', @'k8sapp', PodLabel)
| extend parseLabel = replace(@'app.kubernetes.io/component', @'appkubernetesiocomponent', parseLabel)
| extend parseLabel = replace(@'app.kubernetes.io/instance', @'appkubernetesioinstance', parseLabel)
| extend tags = todynamic(parseLabel)
| extend tag01 = todynamic(tags[0].app)
| extend tag02 = todynamic(tags[0].k8sapp)
| extend tag03 = todynamic(tags[0].appkubernetesiocomponent)
| extend tag04 = todynamic(tags[0].aadpodidbinding)
| extend tag05 = todynamic(tags[0].appkubernetesioinstance)
| extend tag06 = todynamic(tags[0].component)
| extend ContainerRunning = 100 - containerNotrunningPercent
| project ClusterName, TimeGenerated, ControllerKind, Name, Computer,
    ServiceName = strcat(ServiceName, tag01, tag02, tag03, tag04, tag05, tag06),
    ContainerUnavailable = strcat("Unavailable Percentage: ", containerNotrunningPercent),
    ContainerRunning,
    containerNotrunningPercent,
    PodStatus = PodStatus, 
    ContainerStatus = ContainerStatus
content.title: Pod/Container Availability

content.query:
let row = dynamic({row});
KubePodInventory
| where Name has strcat("{Application}","-")
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where '{row}' == '{}' or (Name == row.PodName)
| top-nested of PodUid by max(1), top-nested 1 of TimeGenerated by max(TimeGenerated), top-nested of Computer by max(1), top-nested of Namespace by max(1), top-nested of Name by max(1), top-nested of PodCreationTimeStamp by max(1), top-nested of PodRestartCount by max(1), top-nested of PodStartTime by max(1), top-nested of PodStatus by max(1), top-nested of PodIp by max(1), top-nested of ServiceName by max(1), top-nested of ControllerKind by max(1), top-nested of ControllerName by max(1)
| extend  PodName = Name
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, Namespace, PodName, PodUid, PodCreationTimeStamp, PodRestartCount, PodStartTime, PodStatus, PodIp, ServiceName, ControllerKind, ControllerName
//| project TimeGenerated, Computer, Namespace, PodName, ContainerID, ContainerLastStatus, ContainerName, ContainerRestartCount, ContainerStartTime, ContainerStatus, ContainerStatusReason, ControllerKind, ControllerName
content.title: Pod details

content.query:
let row = dynamic({row});
KubePodInventory
| where Name has strcat("{Application}","-")
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where '{row}' == '{}' or (Name == row.PodName)
| top-nested of ContainerID by max(1), top-nested 1 of TimeGenerated by max(TimeGenerated), top-nested of Computer by max(1), top-nested of Namespace by max(1), top-nested of Name by max(1), top-nested of ContainerLastStatus by max(1), top-nested of ContainerName by max(1), top-nested of ContainerRestartCount by max(1), top-nested of ContainerStartTime by max(1), top-nested of ContainerStatus by max(1), top-nested of ContainerStatusReason by max(1), top-nested of ControllerKind by max(1), top-nested of ControllerName by max(1)
| extend  PodName = Name
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, Namespace, PodName, ContainerID, ContainerLastStatus, ContainerName, ContainerRestartCount, ContainerStartTime, ContainerStatus, ContainerStatusReason, ControllerKind, ControllerName
//| project TimeGenerated, Computer, Namespace, Name, ContainerID, ContainerLastStatus, ContainerName, ContainerRestartCount, ContainerStartTime, ContainerStatus, ContainerStatusReason, ControllerKind, ControllerName
content.title: Container details

content.query:
let row = dynamic({row});
KubePodInventory
| where Name has strcat("{Application}","-")
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where '{row}' == '{}' or (Name == row.PodName)
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, Namespace, Name, PodUid, PodCreationTimeStamp, PodRestartCount, PodStartTime, PodStatus, PodIp, ServiceName, ControllerKind, ControllerName, ContainerID, ContainerLastStatus, ContainerName, ContainerRestartCount, ContainerStartTime, ContainerStatus, ContainerStatusReason, _ResourceId
| join KubeEvents on Computer, Name, _ResourceId, TimeGenerated
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, Name, Reason, Message, KubeEventType, SourceComponent
| extend PodName = Name
content.title: KubeEvents for the Pods

content.query:
let row = dynamic({row});
KubePodInventory
| where Name has strcat("{Application}","-")
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where '{row}' == '{}' or (Name == row.PodName)
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, Namespace, Name, PodUid, PodCreationTimeStamp, PodRestartCount, PodStartTime, PodStatus, PodIp, ServiceName, ControllerKind, ControllerName, ContainerID, ContainerLastStatus, ContainerName, ContainerRestartCount, ContainerStartTime, ContainerStatus, ContainerStatusReason, _ResourceId
| join ContainerLog on Computer, ContainerID, _ResourceId
| project-away TimeGenerated
| project TimeGenerated1, ContainerID, TimeOfCommand, Image, LogEntry, LogEntrySource
| project-rename TimeGenerated = TimeGenerated1
content.title: Container Log
